title: Red & White Salad
summary: Red & White Salad is a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 side dish. This recipe serves 8 and costs $1.25 per serving. One portion of this dish contains about 3g of protein, 0g of fat, and a total of 97 calories. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 4 hours and 10 minutes. 130 people have tried and liked this recipe. Head to the store and pick up radishes, apple, pepper, and a few other things to make it today. With a spoonacular score of 99%, this dish is spectacular. Similar recipes include White Asparagus Arugula Spring Salad with Meyer Lemon White Balsamic Dressing, Pickled Red Onions, and Thai Red Curry with Vegetables.
